page.title: 17TECHNOLOGY IN THE HOME
page.content: AT THE MOMENT ALL OF CLASS FIVE'S DADS GO TO WORK. SOME OF OUR DADS WALK AND SOME GO BY CAR. MANY OF OUR OUR MUMS ALSO WORK.FOURTEEN WORK PART TIME,NINE WORK FULL TIME.MANY OF OUR PARENTS ARE NOW AT WORK DURING THE DAY. WE NEED TIME SAVING AND LABOUR SAVING EQUIPMENT.IN OUR MODERN DAY AND AGE WE HEAR A LOT ABOUT MICROCHIP TECHNOLOGY. WE HAVE MORE TECHNOLOGICAL EQUIPMENT IN OUR HOMES. WE USE THIS TO PROVIDE ENTERTAINMENT FOR EXAMPLE THE COMPUTER AND TO SAVE TIME LIKE AN AUTOMATIC WASHING MACHINE.WE HAVE THIS EQUIPMENT BECAUSE WE HAVE MORE MONEY. THIS MONEY IS PROVIDED BY OUR WORKING MUMS AND DADS. IN OUR GRANDPARENTS' GENERATION MANY OF THE WOMEN STAYED AT HOME TO WORK. IN OUR GENERATION MORE OF OUR PARENTS GO OUT TO WORK. SOME OF THE EQUIPMENT WE HAVE IS A LUXURY BUT SOME IS A NECESSITY.
